version_description:
* Enhanced Magnifying Lens
* Refreshed for the latest iOS version

* Enhanced Magnifying Lens
* Refreshed for the latest iOS version

* Enhanced Magnifying Lens
* Refreshed for the latest iOS version

* Updated for the newer, bigger phones
* Now includes "Flashlight Seasons" - a Today widget you can add to see a different effect each month to brighten your day
* Fixed a bug where Flashlight would often dim the device's screen when leaving the app (…yikes!)
* Improved layout of Word screens and text on Hearts screens
* Slimmed most lines of the Analog Clock screens
* New app icon

* Updated for the newer, bigger phones
* Now includes "Flashlight Seasons" - a Today widget you can add to see a different effect each month to brighten your day
* Fixed a bug where Flashlight would often dim the device's screen when leaving the app (…yikes!)
* Improved layout of Word screens and text on Hearts screens
* Slimmed most lines of the Analog Clock screens
* New app icon

* Updated for the newer, bigger phones
* Now includes "Flashlight Seasons" - a Today widget you can add to see a different effect each month to brighten your day
* Fixed a bug where Flashlight would often dim the device's screen when leaving the app (…yikes!)
* Improved layout of Word screens and text on Hearts screens
* Slimmed most lines of the Analog Clock screens
* New app icon

Flashlight 8.0 is refreshed with extensions and great support for your new devices.

* Updated the Flashlight Seasons today widget with different effects for every month
* Flashlight Sticker Pack with some of the art from the various screens in the app, includes hearts, starts, ghosts, apples, and more

Flashlight 8.0 is refreshed with extensions and great support for your new devices.

* Updated the Flashlight Seasons today widget with different effects for every month
* Flashlight Sticker Pack with some of the art from the various screens in the app, includes hearts, starts, ghosts, apples, and more

Flashlight 8.0 is refreshed with extensions and great support for your new devices.

* Updated the Flashlight Seasons today widget with different effects for every month
* Flashlight Sticker Pack with some of the art from the various screens in the app, includes hearts, starts, ghosts, apples, and more
Improved LED management when opening and returning to the app from the background
